channel.title: Simple on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Simple on Game6r

item.title: Knife Shooter
item.description: Use the cannon to launch the ball and try to get it into the basket. Choose the inclination of the barrel and the strength of the shot with the mouse on a special scale. Each new level will be more difficult than the previous one. Obstacles will appear on the field that need to be destroyed or bypassed. The more accurate your throws are, the more points you earn.
